name: Diamond Faerie
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{S}: Snow creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text:
"That such delicate creatures could become so powerful in the embrace of winter is yet more proof that I am right."
—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Goblin Rimerunner
oracle_text:
{T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
{S}: This creature gains haste until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: Rimerunners set off avalanches to immobilize foes as well as to create more challenging slopes.

name: Boreal Centaur
oracle_text: {S}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: Those who used reindeer as beasts of burden knew to avoid the centaurs, who raged at the enslavement of their spirit-kin.

name: Panglacial Wurm
oracle_text:
Trample
While you're searching your library, you may cast this card from your library.
flavor_text:
"Step lightly and we might be able to use it as a bridge."
—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

name: Perilous Research
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.
flavor_text: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.

name: Hibernation's End
oracle_text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Whenever you pay this enchantment's cumulative upkeep, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to the number of age counters on this enchantment, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Controvert
oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Recover {2}{U}{U} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{U}{U}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

name: Haakon, Stromgald Scourge
oracle_text:
You may cast this card from your graveyard, but not from anywhere else.
As long as Haakon is on the battlefield, you may cast Knight spells from your graveyard.
When Haakon dies, you lose 2 life.

name: Rimescale Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}{S}: Tap target creature and put an ice counter on it. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
Creatures with ice counters on them don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

name: Jötun Owl Keeper
oracle_text:
Cumulative upkeep {W} or {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying for each age counter on it.

name: Krovikan Rot
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
Recover {1}{B}{B} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

name: Balduvian Frostwaker
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.
flavor_text: "Whether frozen or fertile, the land is our ally. It awaits the call to battle."

name: Scrying Sheets
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{S}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If that card is snow, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

name: Ursine Fylgja
oracle_text:
This creature enters with four healing counters on it.
Remove a healing counter from this creature: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to this creature this turn.
{2}{W}: Put a healing counter on this creature.

name: Surging Dementia
oracle_text:
Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast spells with the same name as this spell from among those cards without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
Target player discards a card.

name: Swift Maneuver
oracle_text:
Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text: Darien's call to Yavimaya would have fallen red to the snow had it not been for the agility of the aesthir.

name: Brooding Saurian
oracle_text: At the beginning of each end step, each player gains control of all nontoken permanents they own.
flavor_text:
"I have been trapped in the lizard's lair for days. It seems to regard me as its child and will not let me leave."
—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

name: Surging Sentinels
oracle_text:
First strike
Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast spells with the same name as this spell from among those cards without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

name: Feast of Flesh
oracle_text: Feast of Flesh deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Feast of Flesh in all graveyards.
flavor_text:
"Starving an army that feeds on its enemies is a sound strategy."
—Garza Zol, plague queen

name: Bull Aurochs
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
flavor_text: The aurochs herd is content to graze—until the bull provides the dissenting urge to charge.

name: Mouth of Ronom
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}{S}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: It deals 4 damage to target creature. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

name: Chill to the Bone
oracle_text: Destroy target nonsnow creature.
flavor_text:

—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Thrumming Stone
oracle_text: Spells you cast have ripple 4. (Whenever you cast a spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast spells with the same name as that spell from among the revealed cards without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

oracle_text: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Kjeldoran War Cry in all graveyards.

Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

Flying, haste

Flying
{S}: This creature gains first strike until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text:

Protection from black
{W}: This creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Martyr of Spores
oracle_text: {1}, Reveal X green cards from your hand, Sacrifice this creature: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Weep not for me. I will rise with the spring's new growth."

name: Rimehorn Aurochs
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
{2}{S}: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

name: Highland Weald
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavor_text:
"Our noble land, enslaved by Rime,
Is it our fate to freeze through time?
If this be true, oh wicked crime."
—*The Dynasty of Winter Kings*

name: Luminesce
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that black sources and red sources would deal this turn.
flavor_text:
"The White Shield is not the burnished metal you lash to your forearm but the conviction that burns in your chest."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Heidar, Rimewind Master
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Activate only if you control four or more snow permanents.
flavor_text: "The umber stain of the Thaw will be bleached away. Once again the world will be sharp, white, perfect!"

name: Ronom Serpent
oracle_text:
This creature can't attack unless defending player controls a snow land.
When you control no snow lands, sacrifice this creature.
flavor_text: With the spread of Rimewind's sorcerous winter, snow dwellers reclaimed their places atop the food chain.

name: Boreal Shelf
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text:
"Who will stay the Tyrant's hand,
As ice and woe both grip our land?
The helpless feel his frozen brand."
—*The Dynasty of Winter Kings*

name: Braid of Fire
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep—Add {R}. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor_text: "To a trained mind, the cold is but a momentary distraction."

name: Field Marshal
oracle_text: Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: The Knights of Stromgald struck Darien's Roost from two sides. They would have caught Kjeldor in a pincer attack were it not for Darien's tacticians.

name: Krovikan Mist
oracle_text:
Flying
Krovikan Mist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Illusions on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Plague-induced dreams became real as they swirled above Krov, mingling with the magical residue of the World Spell.

name: Rimewind Cryomancer
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Counter target activated ability. Activate only if you control four or more snow permanents. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
flavor_text: "The Thaw brings flooding, disease, and death. We will do all in our power to bring frigid peace back to the world."

name: Sunscour
oracle_text:
You may exile two white cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy all creatures.

name: Karplusan Strider
oracle_text: This creature can't be the target of blue or black spells.

name: Rune Snag
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} plus an additional {2} for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.

"Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Boreal Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Some creatures are bound to the cold by Rimewind magic. Others seek it out, adapted by two thousand years of the Ice. The Boreal, where Heidar's frigid sway is strongest, is home to both.

name: Kjeldoran Gargoyle
oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: The gargoyles were taken from the walls of flooded Kjeldoran cities and brought upland to guard the outposts of New Argive.

name: Frostweb Spider
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever this creature blocks a creature with flying, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature at end of combat.

This creature doesn't untap during your untap step.

Flying
{S}{S}: This creature gains shroud until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source. A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: The Rimewind wizards strove to perpetuate a magical winter. Their unnatural snows birthed unnatural beasts.

Flying

name: Zombie Musher

Snow landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow land.)
{S}: Regenerate this creature. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

Enchant creature

This land enters tapped.

Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

oracle_text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

oracle_text: Destroy target Plains or Island. Cryoclasm deals 3 damage to that land's controller.

name: Tamanoa

Flying

name: Ronom Unicorn
oracle_text: Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target enchantment.

Trample

Flying

name: Wilderness Elemental

Trample

Flying

name: Kjeldoran Outrider

name: Krovikan Scoundrel
